text: Whispers in Tahiti is a novel by F. J. Thwaites. ==Plot== A young man who is told he only has a short time to live decides to leave England. ==Background== Thwaites researched the novel on a boat trip from Australia to England with his wife. ==Adaptations== A song inspired by the book was issued in 1947.Whispers in Tahiti song as AustLit The novel was adapted for radio in 1948 and in 1953. ==References== ==External links== *Whispers in Tahiti at AustLit Category:1940 Australian novels
title: Whispers in Tahiti
